Environment

Class AntBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • Environment.EnvironmentObject
      • Environment.DynamicObject
        • Environment.AgentBody
          • Environment.AntBody
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAgentBody, IEnvironmentObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QueenBody, SoldierBody

    public class AntBody
extends AgentBody
    The Class AntBody is the "physical" representation of an ant in an environment.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The behaviour debug.

      protected int foodCarried
      The quantity of food carried.
      protected int hunger
      The time it takes before losing health/life from hunger.
      protected int life
      The life expectancy of the ant.
